alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 30 at 9:04PM PST until February 01 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
